screen_desc: It seems there was an issue with receiving the screenshot. Could you please upload the image again? I'll be happy to help describe it.
history_actions: click on the "Play Store" icon located at the right and lower part of the screen.
click on the magnifying glass search icon located at the top-right corner.

think.Thought: The user has asked to uninstall 'Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit'. Since the current screen shows the Google Play Store with a search option available, the next step would be to search for 'Lyft' in the Play Store to find the app and proceed with uninstallation.
Future Action Plan: Type 'Lyft' in the search bar and press 'Enter' to search for the app.
